rules_text: Nourish 2 [i](When this creature enters, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two colorless Food artifact tokens with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
notes:
New card — Replaced Fermented Ooze

With slime counters removed from the set, this space has been opened up for other designs, and green wants a Nourish card at 4.
